channel.title: Employee Well-being on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Employee Well-being on FinanClub

item.title: FHN
item.description: score:240 Chances: First Horizon Corp has an impressive earnings surprise history, indicating a potential beat in its next quarterly report The company has strong capital ratios and loan portfolios that may fare better during downturns The firm was awarded national Gold level recognition for its commitments to employee health and well-being, as measured in the American Heart Association’s 2023 Workforce Well-being Scorecard Risks: The recent rally in regional bank stocks may have limited upside due to potential Fed rate cuts Higher-for-longer rates could slow the economy, taking a toll on the sector Score:240 chances characters count - risks characters count = 240
